name: Door-Monster-Treasure
description:
The warriors of light are here... and they're after your treasure! Nothing can stop them when they work together, but what if you isolate them?

Place wall, doors, monsters, and bait treasure to manipulate our unfortunate heroes, and no matter what happens, don't let them leave with your precious crystal, or Lord Garland will have your head!

Liluo link : https://liluo.io/fluburbio/doormonstertreasure
